entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Known workloads show workloads which are not intended for public consumption #20709
  • ReadyToRun publishing fails in 6.0 due to NETSDK1095 #20701
  • NET6_0_OR_GREATER not defined in net6.0 project built with VS2019 #20700
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21456.8]The output content is empty when starting the global tool application dotnet-format #20694

Closed

  • Hide `--download-to-cache` and `--from-cache` parameters for workload install and update #20642

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BlazorWebAssembly targets to work with updated wasm targets #20742
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #20731
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • Prevent null ref in RazorSourceGenerator #20734
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update branding for 3.1.120 #20705
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix PlatformNotSupportedException for Windows (arm64) #20704
    Area-Workloads
  • Update branding for 5.0.402 #20708
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 3.1.414 #20711
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 5.0.208 #20712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Unskip tests #20600
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Prevent null ref in RazorSourceGenerator #20719
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix workload hidden options #20646
    Area-Workloads

Updated

  • [WIP] Support installing workloads in user folder #18823
    Area-Workloads
  • Only warn about references that are actually needed at runtime #20567
    Area-Compatibility
  • Do not specify a protocol if server does not require secrets #20577
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Cache results of ResolveTargetingPackAssets across builds #19570
    Area-NetSDK
  • [Razor] Ensure the manifest is not generated when there are no assets or discovery patterns #20607
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Disable main loc build while release/6.0.1xx is running #20648
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Fix casing issue when matching projects to configurations #20603
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Razor] Fixes packing on multitargeting projects #20609
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [Blazor] Fix duplicate entries in blazor.boot.json manifest extensions #20602
    Area-AspNetCore
